posts.post_content:
I got a large lot of T206s back from SGC this afternoon.  Surprised at how many came back SGC "A" -- I guess I must be off my game in detecting trimming or other alterations.  Oh well.  

Selling these for SOLD and/or RELISTED in Auction Thread.  Payment via PayPal friends/family.  

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Thanks for looking!
3 cards arrived today to complete my 2nd Net54 transaction. Still looking for nice looking mid grade T206 although Authentic grades acceptable With strong eye appeal.
